item.title: 10 Scenes That Most Define Deadpool’s Marvel Movie Story
item.description: Deadpool is a hugely iconic Marvel character, and his movies have contained a number of scenes that brilliantly define his cinematic story.

item.title: 10 Actors Who Get Fan-Cast In Way Too Many Roles
item.description: Some actors’ names come up over and over again when it comes time to fan-cast popular movie ideas, owing to their popularity as Hollywood stars.

item.title: The Lord Of The Rings' 2026 Gollum Movie Can Finally Do Justice To Lee Pace's Thranduil After The Hobbit Trilogy's Mixed Reception
item.description: It is high time Lee Pace's Thranduil got the renown he deserved, and it looks like 2026's The Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum may give him it.
